page.title: 04MILITARY HOSPITAL
page.content: 21 Doctors work in the hospital which has three operating theatres.The hospital also has a reception area,an X-ray department,Casualty,Outpatients, Pathology,Dispensery,Physiotherapy room. Approximately 48 patients come into casualty on an average day.We watched a soldier having a plaster put on his leg.The old people's ward is leased to the NHS and is controlled from Northallerton .It has about 26 patients,some of them being permenant residents.15 old people attend the day centre each day. The hospital has a very large kitchen and on an average day provides meals for 130 patients and 90 staff.The patients choose their own meals from a menu given to them the previous day. There are 20 cooks in the kitchen under a catering officer,but only 12 are on duty at any one time.
